00063   */
00064 #define IS_BFTM(x)                (IS_BFTM0(x) || IS_BFTM1(x))
00065 
00066 #define IS_BFTM0(x)               (x == HT_BFTM0)
00067 
00068 #if (LIBCFG_BFTM1)
00069 #define IS_BFTM1(x)               (x == HT_BFTM1)
00070 #else
00071 #define IS_BFTM1(x)               (0)
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #define BFTM_FLAG_MATCH           (1UL << 0)
00075 #define BFTM_INT_MATCH            (1UL << 0)
00076 /**
00077   * @}
00078   */
00079
